name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pre-AI Search - Filter Google Before AI Content

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter Google searches to pre-AI content. Find authentic, human-written results easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get more authentic search results by filtering out AI-generated content! Pre-AI Search lets you instantly customise Google search results to show content from before the rise of AI content generation.

Transform your Google searches with Pre-AI Search today!
Note: This extension uses Google's native date filtering system. While it helps reduce AI-generated content by focusing on pre-AI era results, it cannot guarantee complete removal of AI content.
